data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Turfan, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Turfan, Xinjiang Uygur, China
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, we ask for 50 new simple churches in the county of Turfan, Xinjiang Uygur, China. Place a simple church in every community of the 254,900 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Turfan access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Father, help the 19,337 believers in Turfan to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Nubra people might believe through him.
Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the county of Turfan. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Turfan, Xinjiang Uygur, China.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Turfan, Xinjiang Uygur, China.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

location.name: Turfan
location.people_groups_list: Uygur, Taklimakan, Kazakh, Qinghai, Kazakh, Tuvan, Kalmyk-Oirat
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Uygur, Taklimakan (300), Kazakh, Qinghai (3,800), Kazakh (1,880,000), Tuvan (4,300), Kalmyk-Oirat (194,000)
